api.user.login_user(username, password, token=None)[source]¶

Logs in the user and creates a login-token with the specified username and password.

Parameters:
  • username – The username of the user.
  • password – The password of the user.
  • token – (Optional) If the user has enabled two-factor authentication, this must be passed along with username and password. Otherwise, it may be left as None.
Returns:

Whether the login succeeded or not.
Return type:

boolean
